author: Greg in Green Bay

review: Even after only a few days of use, I'm extremely satisfied with the Amazon Fire TV Stick. Aesthetically, Amazon did a great job with the design and the remote is very comfortable to use and designed well. The availability of Netflix and other streaming services is great and works flawlessly via WiFi in my household. Absolutely meets all my needs for the time being. Definitely more than worth the money and probably one of the better purchases I've made so far this year. Thank you Amazon!
author: rspkt

review: It seems to me that the power/USB cord is far too long and complex. The power/USB cord design for the comparable Google Chromecast seems much better in my opinion. The Fire TV Stick requires a wall plug, long USB Cord, additional (but included) adaptor. It has to be plugged in to the wall. You can't just power the device by plugging the USB cord into the USB port on your television like the Chromecast can do.Other than the clunky cord system, I love my Amazon Fire TV Stick.  :-) Good product.
